dcterms:creator: Towaki Takikawa
Andrew Glassner
Morgan McGuire
dcterms:description: A dataset of 63 curated, optimized, and regularized signed distance functions (SDFs) for 3D shapes, designed for use in computer graphics and deep learning applications. The SDFs are provided as analytic expressions and can be efficiently evaluated on a GPU.
dcterms:title: 3D Signed Distance Function Dataset
